Hurrahhhh, PACE has at last confirmed the fact of existence of CIA secret prisons in Europe!
 What is happening with European politicians? I guess some 5 year old newspapers suddenly caught their eyes. Well, PACE is so slow! The scandal around existence CIA secret prisons lasts from 2001 when the first fact of illegal keeping of persons suspected in ties with terrorists by Americans was published. And now after seven years PACE has made a 'revelation'. How long will we apply step on the brakes? Bull sh*t! While PACE has been pondering what to do smart CIA guys have placed new secret prisons in Ukraine and Georgia and at some US military ships! And we need to make some new decisions right now. But I fear that PACE will do it after seven years, no ssoner than that! And of course Washington will invent something new by then! IMO PACE is just working for Americans! That's the thing!

post_info.post_title: PACE has at last confirmed the fact of existence of CIA secret prisons in Europe!

Well, EU officials and PACE in particular have always been so slow and indecisive in making up their mind. And now seven years after the first publishing of revelations relating secret CIA prisons in Europe they found the strength to acknowledge it at last! To tell the truth 7 years are too long period of time in the context! IMO young Europeans need to help their government to be brighter and quicker! Remember how our fathers and mothers made it in 80th of last century when they said NO to Americans set to plant their Pershing missiles in Europe! And I'm sure that we could organize similar protest actions and marches near US embassy and elsewhere. Well, if we stay at home glued to TV screens watching real life there nothing will change and Americans will do whatever they want in our European home! Nothing ventured, nothing gain!
